English: Prologue
Simplified_Chinese: 序 -疑问的开始-

English: Questioning
Simplified_Chinese: 疑问的开始

English: Hmm... What should I do? Hey, can you help me?
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... What should I do? Hey, can you help me?

English: I have been worried for so long, I know I must look a mess. It is good to have a friendly ear to turn to.
Simplified_Chinese: 真的很感谢你啊~其实，最近有一件事情让我很烦恼，皮肤也变的很差..

English: I am studying recent history, but it is really hard. So would you please help me? Please?
Simplified_Chinese: 我最近啊~在研究一个历史..可是好难喔..可以帮我一下吗?

English: Really? Wow! Thanks a lot! Please go to the office and deliver my application for a scholarship. Thank you.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈哈，那请到管理所去申请研究费用，然后亲自把请款单拿去给市长吧。

English: What? Awww I knew it was too good to be true.
Simplified_Chinese: 哎唷~~好过份啊..看在我这么可爱的份上..帮我一次好吗?

English: Oh, it seems like Martinyc is too busy to deliver her own applications.
Simplified_Chinese: 喔，玛缇雅克这么忙啊?既然叫你把请款单拿过来..好!我知道了，帮我告诉他，研究费用我会付支给他。

English: May I help you? You want to fill out an application? The form is on the right side of the office.
Simplified_Chinese: 有什么事吗?喔~你说你要填写请款单啊..请款单在管理所的后面..

English: Go to the office and deliver a scholarship application to the Mayor.
Simplified_Chinese: 请到管理所填写请款单的内容之后，把这个内容拿给市长看吧!

English: Cracked Continent
Simplified_Chinese: 大陆分裂的理由

English: Thank you very much for your help! I received plenty of money to study history thanks to you. Listen, it looks like all of the data about Madrigal is distorted.
Simplified_Chinese: 研究费用已经收到了!我发现一个很可疑的事情耶..我跟你说喔..关于瑞加大陆的历史纪录，好像不太对耶..

English: I have been studying Madrigal history apart from the History Society and it seems that they do not want to correct the distorted history in these books.
Simplified_Chinese: 有很多可疑的地方呢..不知道为什么历史协会的人知道此事实也不会想去修改..所以我就自己调查了一下喔~

English: The other day I was almost killed by renegade Blades but I cannot stop now. No matter what the History Society wants.
Simplified_Chinese: 有一天，我差一点被杀了呢~~那时候我才知道，历史协会的人为什么不去修改了。可是，我绝对不会在这里放弃。

English: I will find out the true history of Madrigal, I have to. Would you please help me? The danger for you could be great however.
Simplified_Chinese: I will find out the true history of Madrigal, I have to. Would you please help me? The danger for you could be great however.

English: Will you help me regardless of the danger?
Simplified_Chinese: 这样你也会为了正义来帮我吗?

English: I knew you would! First, bring me 5 rocks from each of the 3 inhabited continents. Each continent has an Altar, bring me the rocks from each of these.
Simplified_Chinese: 果然，我没有看错人。首先3个大陆里，有古代的祭团。请帮我到各大陆的祭团，找5个岩石回来。

English: Thanks for listening to me anyway. I understand if you are unwilling to risk your life.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..你觉得不值得为这种事情牺牲生命啊..那就没办法了~我去找其他人来帮我好了!

English: Hmm... This is exactly what I expected. I will study these some more but before you go please...
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... This is exactly what I expected. I will study these some more but before you go please...

English: ...you should be very, very careful. I am almost sure that the assassins that tried to kill me will come after you.
Simplified_Chinese: ...you should be very, very careful. I am almost sure that the assassins that tried to kill me will come after you.

English: Please bring me 5 rocks from each continent - Flaris, Darkon, and Saint Morning. Good luck!
Simplified_Chinese: 帕里、达肯、晨光到这3个大陆的祭团，找5个岩石回来，拜托你了!

English: There are ancient altars on each continent. Please bring me 5 rocks from each contient.
Simplified_Chinese: 3个大陆里，有古代的祭团。请帮我到各大陆的祭团，找5个岩石回来。

English: Plot Begins
Simplified_Chinese: 阴谋的开始

English: This is evidence that the continents were once one land mass. I am trusting you with this information because, well...
Simplified_Chinese: This is evidence that the continents were once one land mass. I am trusting you with this information because, well...

English: ...we are in the same boat now. We are in danger together. Would you go through with me to the end?
Simplified_Chinese: ...we are in the same boat now. We are in danger together. Would you go through with me to the end?

English: Okay. Now please deliver this to Gothante. He is the chairman of the History Society in Saint City. Do not forget to be aware of the assasins.
Simplified_Chinese: 好，现在到晨光的历史协会，找一个叫做扎森特的人之后，把这个交给他。在路上可能会遇到想要暗杀你的人，所以要多注意喔!!

English: I do not want to force you, but never forget that you are in danger.
Simplified_Chinese: 你真的不想帮我的话，那也没办法了..但是，你要记住，你已经有危险了。

English: This... This is... Bubble protect us. Martinyc has finally crossed the line. It is about time.
Simplified_Chinese: This... This is... Bubble protect us. Martinyc has finally crossed the line. It is about time.

English: Thank you very much. Take this letter of recommendation and visit Hachal in Darkon 1.
Simplified_Chinese: 非常感谢你。拿着这个推荐信去达肯1拜访哈查尔吧。

English: I am sure he can help you. Take care!
Simplified_Chinese: 那个人应该可以帮我们的!那就拜托你了..

English: Do you want to know about the true history of Madrigal? Then I am the man to talk to.
Simplified_Chinese: 想要知道历史吗?这样你就找对我了..哈哈。

English: Deliver this to Gothante, he is the Chairman of the History Society in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 到晨光的历史协会，找一个叫做扎森特的人之后，把这个交给他。

English: Chapter 1 The Field of Bubble
Simplified_Chinese: 第一章 波布尔的平原 < 波布尔的平原>

English: Hmm? Did Gothante tell you to visit me? Why?
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯？是扎森特叫你来见我的吗？为什么？

English: Oh, I see. Iblis watch over me, what is this information!? Who could have dug up this much of the past? Only one person?
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯，是高潭提拉的签名没有错。啊..!这个是!!

English: Martinyc of course. She has finally done what we all knew she would. She does not fear death like she should. The young are too fearless these days.
Simplified_Chinese: 这..这是玛缇雅克，这个人终于闯祸了。他以为他有几条命啊!!

English: Aw well we all knew that the true history of Madrigal would be discovered eventually. And we all knew that Martinyc would be the one to uncover it.
Simplified_Chinese: 可是，这才是杰作啦!瑞加终于要露出它的真相了。

English: By the way... Are you going to continue with this?
Simplified_Chinese: 好!这个就这样吧!你还要继续做下去吗?

English: Good. We will go to the Field of Bubble. There is more evidence to be found there. Hurry.
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，你知道波布尔的平原吧?我看了这些之后才想到的，你到那边的话，或许可以找到一些线索..快去吧!

English: What? No, you cannot stop now. You have come so far.
Simplified_Chinese: 你这个人不能在这里放弃啦!你已经变成这件事情的关键人物了..再仔细的考虑一下吧。

English: Ahhh you are here finally. Give me the data and letter of recommendation.
Simplified_Chinese: 现在才到啊?可能我太早来了，先把资料跟推荐书拿来给我看一下。

English: This place is very strange... Hmm... Field of Bubble... What do you think about it?
Simplified_Chinese: This place is very strange... Hmm... Field of Bubble... What do you think about it?

English: You know the Field of Bubble, right? I think we can find some evidence there. Lets go! Hurry up!
Simplified_Chinese: 你知道波布尔的平原吧?我看了这些之后才想到的，你到那边的话，或许可以找到一些线索..快去吧!

English: Chapter 1: Field of Bubble: The Strange Pattern
Simplified_Chinese: 第一章 波布尔的平原 <诡异的纹样>

English: Before you showed up I took a look around and found something strange to the North. The ground was dug up and...
Simplified_Chinese: Before you showed up I took a look around and found something strange to the North. The ground was dug up and...

English: ...it looked like some kind of pattern. I could get a close look at it because it was surrounded .
Simplified_Chinese: ...it looked like some kind of pattern. I could get a close look at it because it was surrounded .

English: Strange fellows were hanging around there. I think they were defending something. There was no way I could have fought them off.
Simplified_Chinese: 因为有一些很奇怪的家伙在那边徘徊，我又不会打架..所以没有仔细的看到啦。

English: Would you check? I am sure they are no match for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 你要不要去试试看啊?我想如果是你的话，应该可以对付他们。

English: Great! I am sure that there is something to that pattern. Check it closely and bring me what you find.
Simplified_Chinese: 好，我觉得啊，仔细的看看那个纹样的话，应该会看到什么线索，仔细的观察之后，如果有看到什么东西的话，一定要拿过来给我啊。

English: Are you really ready to give up? I cannot force you but think about the future.
Simplified_Chinese: 真的要在这里放弃吗?如果你想放弃的话，我也没办法了..只担心你的前途啦..哎..

English: Oh! This! The legend is... Martinyc was right! Oh... What should we do now... Iblis watch over me!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊！这是！这是那传说中的...原来玛缇雅克说的都是真的！

English: Were those fellows too strong for you? Bring more people with you and continue checking. I am not strong enough to help you with them.
Simplified_Chinese: 他们果然不是好对付的啊..连你都打不过他们，你要不要去组剧团试试啊?

English: I am sure we can find out something by checking the pattern. Please check it carefully and bring me whatever you get.
Simplified_Chinese: 仔细的看看那个纹样的话，应该会看到什么线索，仔细的观察之后，如果有看到什么东西的话，一定要拿过来。

English: Chapter 1: Field of Bubble: The Violet Magician Troupe
Simplified_Chinese: 第一章 波布尔的平原 <紫色的魔法团>

English: Hmm... I checked the cloth piece you brought me. It seems like the pattern on the cloth piece is the same as the one I saw on the ground.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... I checked the cloth piece you brought me. It seems like the pattern on the cloth piece is the same as the one I saw on the ground.

English: However, there is a mystrious power in this cloth piece. I will check it out some more. By the way, have you ever heard of the Magic Troupe in Purple? I found out about them by chance.
Simplified_Chinese: 我发现这个布条里面，有一种魔法的力量，再调查一下的话，应该就会知道这是什么了。我刚刚研究的时候突然想到..有一个叫做<紫色的魔法团>..

English: I do not know the details, but I know that this group has something to do with the secrets of Madrigal.
Simplified_Chinese: 你有听说过吗?我猜他们应该跟瑞加大陆的历史有关连性。

English: I think we need more information about this Troupe. How about helping me once more? Would you do that for me?
Simplified_Chinese: 我要查一下这个魔法团，既然你都来到这里了，可以帮我调查一下吗?

English: Great! Please gather information about the Troupe and its members. You will have to fight them to get any information out of them.
Simplified_Chinese: 好，你去帮我查一下他们的动机，我想你去猎杀他们，应该就会知道了。我先回到达肯，你到达肯来找我吧。

English: You are afraid of them? I can hardly believe that. Ha ha ha.
Simplified_Chinese: 觉得他们很恐怖所以没办法帮我啊?你真的太懦弱了吧!!这样怎么能够生存在社会上呢..哎呀..

English: Hmm... That was exactly what I thought... Now go back and take a rest. But please visit me again later. Thank you very much.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... That was exactly what I thought... Now go back and take a rest. But please visit me again later. Thank you very much.

English: Was it too much for you? Ah...but we need information about them.
Simplified_Chinese: 有点麻烦吗?可是我觉得没有一些关于他们的东西的话，我怕很难追查下去呀..

English: Fight them to get information from them. I will meet you in Darken.
Simplified_Chinese: 去帮我查一下他们的动机，我想你去猎杀他们，应该就会知道了。我先回到达肯，你到达肯来找我吧。

English: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade
Simplified_Chinese: 第二章 谢德莉丘岭 <谢德莉丘岭>

English: Hey! Great timing! I have just found out about something very interesting.
Simplified_Chinese: 你来了啊..来的正好，我有了新发现，是一个很有趣的事情呢~你问我是什么东西啊?你来看看..

English: Do you know what this is? Well, I am sure you do not but I will tell you.
Simplified_Chinese: 就是这个..你上次拿给我的布条，还记得吧?

English: This is an entire picture of the pattern we found. I found it in one of my books but it was the only picture I could find.
Simplified_Chinese: 那个布条上的完整图片啦..我查看古代书籍的时候发现的，可是只有图片呢..

English: I need your help once again. Would you do ma a favor?
Simplified_Chinese: 我可能要再仔细的调查一下，当然需要你的帮忙，可以帮我吧?

English: Take this picture. Please deliver it to Rovanett in the National Library in Saint City. You can find her at Saint Hall.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯，拿着这个图片，到晨光之后把这个交给在图书馆工作的鲁巴迦丽，在晨光圣教堂附近可以找到他。

English: Hey we are in this together. We are all in the same boat. You would do better to help me You know that.
Simplified_Chinese: 喂~帮我一下啦，反正我们都做在同一条船上了不是吗?

English: Hmm... Is this what Hachal said? Good job. Thank you very much. Let me check.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... Is this what Hachal said? Good job. Thank you very much. Let me check.

English: History is always more interesting than current events but this is especially mysterious.
Simplified_Chinese: 古代记录比现在的历史还要有趣，又神秘又有很多的疑惑。但是，对我来说，这个实在是太有趣了。

English: Here. Take this picture. Please deliver it to Rovanett who is working in the National Library in Saint City. You can find her in Saint Hall.
Simplified_Chinese: 拿好这个图片，晨光之后把这个交给在图书馆工作的鲁巴迦丽，在晨光圣教堂附近可以找到他。

English: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade: The Great Troupe Leader.
Simplified_Chinese: 第二章 谢德莉丘岭 <大团长豋场>

English: Oh your story about the pattern reminds me of something I read in one of the ancient texts.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，听完这个纹样的事情之后想到了一件事情。是我在以前研究古代文书的时候发现的。

English: Do you know the Hill of Shade? I found it in one of my books but have only dared to venture there once.
Simplified_Chinese: 你知道<谢德莉丘岭>吗?突然想到，我在之前研究古代文书时，发现的一个地方，后来我去过那边。

English: There is a pattern similar to the one that you saw in the Field of Bubble. Or maybe it was exactly the same. If those two patterns are the same...
Simplified_Chinese: There is a pattern similar to the one that you saw in the Field of Bubble. Or maybe it was exactly the same. If those two patterns are the same...

English: ...maybe you can also find a cloth piece over there. Would you please go and check?
Simplified_Chinese: ...maybe you can also find a cloth piece over there. Would you please go and check?

English: Thank you. Please check around for the pattern in the Hill of Shade. Oh! Please be careful because there is something very fierce over there!
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你，请帮我去调查一下谢德莉丘岭的纹样，那边有很多很恐怖的怪物，所以要小心喔。

English: I understand but if you ever get the chance would you please check?
Simplified_Chinese: 好，我知道了，希望以后你可以去调查看看，真的是很重要的。

English: Iblis above, you look terrible. I appreciate your hard work. You did exceptional work. Let me compare the two cloth pieces.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..你的样子怎么搞成这样了，辛苦你了!!我来跟之前的布条一起调查看看好了。

English: Maybe the monster I mentioned earlier was too much for you to handle? You can try again if you wish or not up to you.
Simplified_Chinese: 那么恐怖的东西..我想你一个人应该很难对付的，我相应该要..

English: Please check around for the pattern in the Hill of Shade. Oh! Please be careful because there is something very fierce over there!
Simplified_Chinese: 请帮我去调查一下谢德莉丘岭的纹样，那边有很多很恐怖的怪物，所以要小心喔。

English: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade: History of Hardship
Simplified_Chinese: 第二章 谢德莉丘岭 <苦难的历史>

English: I finished checking the data that Hachal provided. Please deliver this to Hachal.
Simplified_Chinese: 我已经检查过哈查尔提供的资料了。把这个带给他吧。

English: I hope you will continue to be as lucky as you have been.
Simplified_Chinese: 祝你一路顺风~

English: If not you then who? No one can take this job!
Simplified_Chinese: …真的没办法帮我转达给他吗?

English: Hmm... History of Hardship. So did he give this to you? Excellent. If he says this will be useful then I am sure it will.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... History of Hardship. So did he give this to you? Excellent. If he says this will be useful then I am sure it will.

English: See you later. Take care.
Simplified_Chinese: 过几天再见吧!!

English: Did Rovanett say anything? That makes no sense. Please visit her again. She must have something to say to you.
Simplified_Chinese: 鲁巴迦丽没给你任何答案吗？不可能啊，请再去找她，她一定有些事要告诉你。

English: I finished checking the data which Hachal requested. Please deliver this to Hachal.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈查尔要我帮他调查的，我已经调查好了。你把这个交给哈查尔吧。

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician
Simplified_Chinese: 第三章 紫色的魔法师

English: Hey. It seems like the altar and Magic Troupe have something to do with...
Simplified_Chinese: Hey. It seems like the altar and Magic Troupe have something to do with...

English: ...the Purple Magician in this book. History of Hardship. Only it says that the Black Magician and the Magician in Purple are the same person. The same person that fought alongside the heroes in the Hero Wars. That does not make sense.
Simplified_Chinese: ...the Purple Magician in this book. History of Hardship. Only it says that the Black Magician and the Magician in Purple are the same person. The same person that fought alongside the heroes in the Hero Wars. That does not make sense.

English: It is something really unbelievable, but it is also something we should believe.
Simplified_Chinese: 解救了这世界的黑暗魔法师是同一个人啊。真是很难相信的内容啊..可是又不能不信。

English: I think this is the best I can do for now but I will never stop looking for the truth.
Simplified_Chinese: 我可以调查的地方，可能只到这里了。但是我已经知道这个事实了，所以又不想在这里放弃。

English: You! I want you to show this to someone. Can you do that right now?
Simplified_Chinese: 你拿着这个帮我去找一个人，现在就可以帮我去找吗?

English: Yes! Please deliver this to Gothante in Saint City. He is he head of the History Society.
Simplified_Chinese: 是的，请把这个带给晨光的扎森特。他历史研究协会的负责人。

English: I understand that you have other things to do. But this is very important. Come back soon.
Simplified_Chinese: 你有其他急事啊..好吧，你先去忙好了，忙完了就要过来喔..因为这个也是很急的事情。

English: Hey! Long time no see! Did you meet Hachal? What is this?
Simplified_Chinese: 嘿！好久不见！你见过哈查尔了吗？这是什么？

English: Oh... Bubble protect us! Is this true? Oh... Oh... This is too big to deal with alone.
Simplified_Chinese: Oh... Bubble protect us! Is this true? Oh... Oh... This is too big to deal with alone.

English: I am really glad to see you again, but did Hachal tell you to meet me? For what?
Simplified_Chinese: 见到你很高兴，但是哈查尔说让你来见我了吗？是因为什么？

English: Please deliver this to Gothante in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 请把这个带给晨光的扎森特。

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: The Secret of the Altar
Simplified_Chinese: 第三章 紫色的魔法师 <祭团的秘密>

English: Hmm... I have some good theories but we are going to need more information about the altar and the Magic Troupe.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... I have some good theories but we are going to need more information about the altar and the Magic Troupe.

English: I think there is something in the altar. I have a strong feeling that we could find something there if we look closely enough.
Simplified_Chinese: 我觉得祭团那边应该会有一些线索才对，仔细的去找找的话，或许会找的到吧。

English: Listen. This is very important. Just stick with this until the end. Would you?
Simplified_Chinese: 哎唷~~你到现在都一直帮我们了啊，所以这次也帮我一下吧。

English: Please check the altar until you can find some evidence.
Simplified_Chinese: 我刚刚也说过了，请你帮我去查一下紫色的剧团。不管去哪里都可以，只要帮我找到线索就好了。

English: What could be more important than this? Oh fine, just go.
Simplified_Chinese: 除了这个还有其他更重要的事情吗?真是的..除了去厕所之外，应该没有比这个更重要的事情吧..

English: Hmm... Everything is written in an ancient language. But we can translate it. Thanks.
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... Everything is written in an ancient language. But we can translate it. Thanks.

English: Please come back to me after the translation is over. Let me bring this book to the translator.
Simplified_Chinese: 等我翻一好这本书之后再来找我吧，我要去把这本书交给翻译社了。

English: You can check all of the 3 altars, bring any evidence you find at any of them.
Simplified_Chinese: 把3个祭团全部找一下也是可以啦，可是如果知道哪里会有线索的话，不需要多跑到其他地方了。

English: Please check the altar until you find out something of importance.
Simplified_Chinese: 请你帮我去查一下紫色的剧团。不管去哪里都可以，只要帮我找到线索就好了。

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: A Mysterious Bead.
Simplified_Chinese: 第三章 紫色的魔法师 <诡异的晶球>

English: I have finished translating the book. The Purple Magician and the Black Magician are the same person! Just as Hachal said!
Simplified_Chinese: 我已经翻译完这本书了，紫色魔法师和黑色魔法师是同一个人！正如哈查尔所说！

English: It looks like the purple altar was made by the Magician in Purple for some kind of religious service.
Simplified_Chinese: 可是，我发现了一件事情。那紫色的魔法师盖的紫色祭坛，好像是为了祭拜某个东西而盖的。

English: It seems that they were attempting to transcend to a better existence but how?
Simplified_Chinese: 用途是这样的啦。我觉得马特尼提特拿给我的这个布条上面形容着，它是一个超越能力的东西。

English: As always, I have a few good theories but I need more data. Always more data! I want answers now!
Simplified_Chinese: 或许，那个超越能力的东西，就是祭拜对象。虽然还没有根据事实，所以啊..

English: Would you help me again? I can see the curiosity in your eyes, same as mine. Am I right?
Simplified_Chinese: 可以在帮我一下吗?我看你应该也很想知道真实吧。

English: Very well! Then please check the Field of Bubble and the Hill of Shade more carefully. I am really sure there is something over there!
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，你仔细的帮我去调查一下波布尔的平原跟谢德莉丘岭。那边!!一定!!会有线索。

English: Fine, return to me when you get the time.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果没有什么急事的话，先帮我处里这件事情好吗?

English: Oh... What a strong magical power this bead has... Oh... What a surprise!
Simplified_Chinese: Oh... What a strong magical power this bead has... Oh... What a surprise!

English: Good job...But something like this is completely out of my range. Let me think for a moment. Yes, I have it!
Simplified_Chinese: Good job...But something like this is completely out of my range. Let me think for a moment. Yes, I have it!

English: Please deliver this to the Great Magician Laola in Darkon 3.
Simplified_Chinese: 拿着这个到达肯3的艾音娜特去找大魔导士<拉宇>吧。

English: I have a bad feeling about this. I have never been wrong about anything. I hope I am this time.
Simplified_Chinese: 很难找吗?可是我真的觉得有啊，我的预感从来没错过~

English: Please, once more, check the Field of Bubble and the Hill of Shade. I am sure that there is more to be found!
Simplified_Chinese: 仔细的帮我去调查一下波布尔的平原跟谢德莉丘岭。那边!!一定!!会有线索。

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: The Great Magician Laola
Simplified_Chinese: 第三章 紫色的魔法师 <大魔导士 拉宇>

English: Oh, you are here finally. I cannot say that your arrival is entirely a surprise. I am Laola the Great Magician *cough* *cough*.
Simplified_Chinese: 喔，你终于来了啊，我等你等很久了，我就是<拉宇>。

English: I can see in your face that you do not believe me. I guess, looking at myself, I do not look like such a Great Magician.
Simplified_Chinese: 你不相信啊?也对啦，我这个样子..或许配不上大魔法师的称号啦。

English: Magic always has a high cost and I used some terrible magic back then.
Simplified_Chinese: 我之前练魔法的时候，学到了一个很奇怪的魔法..从那时候开始，我就要用这种样子生活到死为止，哈哈。

English: But never mind that, show me the bead you brought, I can feel its power from here.
Simplified_Chinese: 不管怎样，你先把你拿来的东西给我看一下，是一个晶球对吧?

English: Yes, this is it. I have to check this first, so please come back to me in a minute.
Simplified_Chinese: 对对~果然是这个东西..你等一下再来找我好吗?我要先观察一下这个东西。

English: *cough* *cough* Hey, do not be too greedy. Something that powerful could corrupt you to your core. *cough* *cough*
Simplified_Chinese: 呵呵~年轻人..你好像对其他东西有兴趣喔~这样不太好呢..

English: Hmmm I did not know he could make something like this, but I cannot say that I am surprised.
Simplified_Chinese: 原来..原来是这样啊..呼，真没有想到是这家伙..真没想到..

English: It is no secret why I am called the Great Magician. Though, I have learned that being a great magician, does not make you a great person. *cough*
Simplified_Chinese: 你知道我为什么有大魔法师的称号吗?哈哈..因为啊..这是秘密..呵呵..

English: This is it. I have to check this first, so please come back to me in a minute.
Simplified_Chinese: 对对~果然是这个东西..你等一下再来找我好吗?我要先观察一下这个东西。

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: Identity of the Purple Magician
Simplified_Chinese: 第三章 紫色的魔法师 <紫色魔法师的身份>

English: *cough* *cough* This bead, with all of its power, was crafted by the only pupil I ever had, Lapranche. *cough*
Simplified_Chinese: 这个晶球是我的徒弟<拉佛兰栖>做的..

English: She is the Black Magician. I was also the Black Magician at one point. We have often been confused for each other throughout history. *Sigh* It seems that Lapranche found out about them.
Simplified_Chinese: She is the Black Magician. I was also the Black Magician at one point. We have often been confused for each other throughout history. *Sigh* It seems that Lapranche found out about them.

English: You believe in them now right? If you are looking to me for answers about what they were, you are wasting your time. All I know is that they created all of Madrigal and that they were once agents of Rhisis.
Simplified_Chinese: 你是想要知道关于他们的事情吗?嗯..可是我也不是很清楚..我知道的只有他们是被黎席斯神所创作出来的。

English: Yes Lapranche found out about them and attempted to bring them back to this world with the Purple Magic, the same magic that drained me of so much.
Simplified_Chinese: 对，这家伙已经知道他是紫色的魔法，所以才对这个碰手的..我变成这个样子..也都是因为紫色的魔法而造成的..原来，所有的事情都是这样的。

English: Do me a favor would you?
Simplified_Chinese: 年轻人，我有一个事情想拜托你。

English: You are afraid. I am not surprised. The world hangs in the balance. Who would not be scared? Go on. Get out of here.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..连听都不听就拒绝我啊..嗯..你会害怕吗?呵呵呵。

English: What a terrible... Where did they come from? Did you see them? Renegade Blades seemingly hired to kill me. It would appear that I know too much. What is that you have there?
Simplified_Chinese: What a terrible... Where did they come from? Did you see them? Renegade Blades seemingly hired to kill me. It would appear that I know too much. What is that you have there?

English: Oh, this! Is this the book that Laola wrote? Amazing
Simplified_Chinese: 哇~这是拉宇写给我的吗?嗯..一看就知道是一个很贵重的东西了。

English: Fine. Now we can begin the real reconstruction of the history of our world. Thank you. Oh, I may need you later on. See you then.
Simplified_Chinese: 好了，我可以拿这些东西来专心的研究了。感谢你啦~啊，我还是会请你过来一趟的，过几天再见~

English: You could not find Loala? It is not like he is hiding or anything. Please try again.
Simplified_Chinese: 见到拉宇了吗?哎呀~艾音娜特是满大的，但是，他应该不会躲起来啦，所以再去找一下吧!

English: Please deliver this book to Gothante. This may not be enough to save the world but it should be useful. Thank you and good luck.
Simplified_Chinese: 把这个东西拿去给扎森特。这是我对他们调查的一些事情，虽然不是很多的资料，可是，应该会有一点帮助啦。

English: Chapter 4 Their Shadow
Simplified_Chinese: 第四章 《他们的影子》

English: Oh, nice to see you again. I have found something based on the data you gave me. You know more than most about the Clowns at this point.
Simplified_Chinese: 啊，你来了啊。我用你帮我找来的资料研究了下..你知道小丑吗?还是有听过他的事情吗?

English: People have been talking about them for some time now. They are known as three devils that created our continents on accident and are bent on destroying them. During the Hero War, they were said to stand against the heroes of our land.
Simplified_Chinese: 一直以来，人们一直在谈论他们。 被称为三个恶魔的他们，在无意间创造了我们的大陆，然后又一心要摧毁它。 在英雄战争期间，据说他们与我们的英雄为敌。

English: Lapranche was there, at the end of the Hero War, she was made the slave of One of the three Clown Gods. Shade, Goddess of Evil. Shade, marrying her Godly presence to the great power of Laola, attempted to destroy Bubble, God of Good, while Iblis, God of Neutrality, watched unmoved. Bubble rallied the heroes of Madrigal and stood against Shade with the strongest army our world has ever know at her back.
Simplified_Chinese: Lapranche was there, at the end of the Hero War, she was made the slave of One of the three Clown Gods. Shade, Goddess of Evil. Shade, marrying her Godly presence to the great power of Laola, attempted to destroy Bubble, God of Good, while Iblis, God of Neutrality, watched unmoved. Bubble rallied the heroes of Madrigal and stood against Shade with the strongest army our world has ever know at her back.

English: Poor Lapranche, the things she must have gone through And all this history has been distorted by the History Society. Curse them!
Simplified_Chinese: Poor Lapranche, the things she must have gone through And all this history has been distorted by the History Society. Curse them!

English: *sigh* Would you help me return this to Martinyc. She deserves to know what she helped uncover.
Simplified_Chinese: 反正不管怎样，你可以把这个帮我拿给玛缇雅克吗?

English: I see, you have something important to do. Would you come back to me after finishing that?
Simplified_Chinese: 你现在有急事啊，好吧!等你忙完的再过来找我吧!

English: Long time no see! Are you coming back to let me know that I was right?
Simplified_Chinese: 啊!好久不见啊，要拿新消息给我吗?

English: Yeah! I knew it! By the way, what is that?
Simplified_Chinese: 耶!!我就知道会这样，哈哈哈。咦?这是什么啊?

English: Oh, now I wish I had been wrong! Thank you for bringing this to me. We will see each other again. Goodbye.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯..啊?这是..谢谢你啦。下次应该还有机会碰面的，再见~

English: Have you brought something from the History Society? No? Then are you coming back just to talk to me? I am too shy for that.
Simplified_Chinese: 历史协会有东西要给我吗?不是啊?不然呢..因为你太想我了吗?唉唷~~讨厌啦..

English: Here is all the data I have. Please deliver this to Martinyc.
Simplified_Chinese: 把这个东西帮我拿去给玛缇雅克吧。这是我整理出来的结果。拜托你了。

English: Journal of an Adventurer
Simplified_Chinese: 冒险者日记

English: Journal of an Adventurer (1)
Simplified_Chinese: 冒险者日记 (1)

English: Hello Adventurer. Although you don't know me, I must ask a favor of you. I have found something… incredible. Bring it to the Mayor of Darkon right away.
Simplified_Chinese: 你好，冒险者。我知道你不认识我，但我需要你的帮助。我发现了一些...非常难以置信的事情。请你马上将它交给达肯市长。

English: Thank you, I am in your debt.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢，这是我欠你的。

English: You can not understand the implications of this quest… He needs this book!
Simplified_Chinese: 你根本不理解这个委托会产生什么样的影响... 他需要这本书！

English: You seem to have something important to say, what is it?
Simplified_Chinese: 你似乎有什么很重要的事情要说，请直说吧。

English: OH MY! I can't believe this! The diary of the adventurer Bartholomew Hunt…
Simplified_Chinese: 这...这是冒险者巴塞洛缪·亨特的日记，实在是难以置信！

English: Deliver the Diary to the Mayor of Darkon.
Simplified_Chinese: 将日记交给达肯市长。

English: Journal of an Adventurer (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 冒险者日记 (2)

English: You should hear this. This is the diary of the adventurer Bartholomew Hunt. My grand father knew of him, he was a legend at one time…
Simplified_Chinese: 听着。这是冒险者巴塞洛缪·亨特的日记。我的祖父知道他，他是那个时代的传奇...

English: HA! Look at this… he is claiming that he discovered a new continent. New continent? How absurd!
Simplified_Chinese: 哈！快看...他声称他发现了新大陆。新大陆？这可太荒谬了！

English: I can't read the writing here, it appears to be a code of some sort. Maybe the Sage Radion can figure out what this writing is. Please bring him the diary.
Simplified_Chinese: 这部分内容看起来像是某种代码，我没办法理解。大贤者拉迪温可能能认出这写的是什么。请将日记带给他。

English: Sage Radion is is in the Northern Leren Mountains, near the Fountain of Dead Person.
Simplified_Chinese: 大贤者拉迪温在乐雅山脉北部的亡者之泉附近

English: You are to busy? If this information is accurate do you know what this could mean?
Simplified_Chinese: 你现在没空？如果这信息足够准确，你知道这意味着什么吗？

English: What brings you to see me?
Simplified_Chinese: 你为什么要来见我？

English: If the Mayor of Darkon sent you, it must be important. Let me see the Diary.
Simplified_Chinese: 如果是达肯市长派你来的，这一定非常重要。让我先看看这日记。

English: Find the Sage Radion to decode the writing in the Diary.
Simplified_Chinese: 找到大贤者拉迪温来解码日记的内容。

English: Journal of an Adventurer (3)
Simplified_Chinese: 冒险者日记 (3)

English: Why, this is not a code… Amazing! The language of the Ancient Tribe. This Bartholomew Hunt must have really known his stuff. Maybe there is more to this…
Simplified_Chinese: 为什么...这并不是一种代码...令人震惊！这是一种古代部落的语言。这位巴塞洛缪·亨特一定很了解这些。继续看，也许还会有更多的内容...

English: I have translated the Ancient language. Bring this Translated Document to the Mayor of Darkon. Keep it safe, this is truly a special thing!
Simplified_Chinese: 我已经将古代语言翻译好了。将翻译文档交给达肯市长。保管好它，这真的是非常重要的东西！

English: You are playing an important role in historic events.
Simplified_Chinese: 你在历史事件中扮演着重要的角色。

English: I can't believe it! The possibility of a new land and you are not interested?
Simplified_Chinese: I can't believe it! The possibility of a new land and you are not interested?

English: You can't imagine how eagerly I've been waiting for you to return. Have you met the Sage Radion? Is there news?
Simplified_Chinese: 你无法想象我有多迫切地期待你回来。你见到大贤者拉迪温了吗？有什么新消息吗？

English: He was able to translate it? Wonderful. Now we can see if this is real or just a wild goose chase… Give me a moment to read through this.
Simplified_Chinese: 他翻译了日记吗？不错，现在我们可以看看这是真的还是白费力气了。请给我一些时间阅读一下翻译文档。

English: Bring the translated document to the Mayor of Darkon.
Simplified_Chinese: 将翻译文档带给达肯市长。

English: Chain
Simplified_Chinese: 剧情

English: General
Simplified_Chinese: 一般

English: Office
Simplified_Chinese: 委托所

English: Event
Simplified_Chinese: 活动

English: Don’t worry about the pay. So, please hurry up.
Simplified_Chinese: 你不用担心报酬。所以，请你尽快完成委托吧。

English: It is very important, so you'd better hurry!
Simplified_Chinese: 它真的非常重要，所以请你最好快点！

English: The Mayor of Darkon is waiting for you. Hurry!
Simplified_Chinese: 达肯市长正在等着你。赶快！

English: Chapter 1 The Emerging Darkness
Simplified_Chinese: 章节 1 黑暗复苏

English: Chapter 2 Finding Lost Memory
Simplified_Chinese: 章节 2 寻找遗失的记忆

English: Chapter 3 Return of Scattered Heroes
Simplified_Chinese: 章节 3 各路英雄的回归

English: Initiation of Champions
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄伊始

English: Hmm, I sense an aura of greatness from you young warrior, yet a mind clouded with uncertainty and doubt.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯...年轻的战士，我能从你身上感觉到一股强大的气场，但你的内心还充满了不确定和怀疑。

English: I intend to help you realize your true inner potential. Though I am but a stranger to you, I need you to trust in me. My true identity will be revealed soon enough.
Simplified_Chinese: 我愿意帮助你激发你的潜能。虽然我对你来说仍然是陌生的，但我需要你相信我。我的真实身份很快就会揭晓。

English: Apparently I was correct in choosing you. Well then! Please eliminate 10 Lawolfs & 5 Grownup Lawolfs residing in Northern Flaris.
Simplified_Chinese: 很显然，选择你是正确的。那么好的，接下来请击败栖息在帕里北部的 10只山地野狼和 5只山地老狼吧。

English: Hmm, apparently I made a mistake. I believed you to be the champion I was searching for.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯...相信你是我一直寻找的英雄的这个想法显然是错的。

English: The citizens grow ever more fearful of this situation! Please get rid of 10 Lawolfs & 5 Grownup Lawolfs.
Simplified_Chinese: 居民们对这种情况愈发的害怕了！请你前去击杀10只山地野狼和5只山地老狼。

English: Kill 10 Lawolfs & 5 Grownup Lawolfs and go back to Reonan.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死10只山地野狼和5只山地老狼后回去找瑞尔南。

English: Ah! I admire your courage. It appears you could very well be the champion I have sought.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈！我欣赏你的勇气。看来你很有可能成为我所追寻的英雄。

English: Bridge to Terror-bithia
Simplified_Chinese: 通往恐怖比提亚的桥梁

English: But, let us not be too hasty as arrogance may lead to an early grave. Though vicious, slaying a few lawolves is just the beginning…
Simplified_Chinese: 但是，傲慢会让我们提前陷入绝境，我们必须谨慎不能仓促行事。虽然很残忍，但是杀几只山地野狼仅仅只是开始...

English: Here is your next task. Rumors have it, numerous villagers have been attacked by a monstrous Lord Demian just outside of Flaris. Please defeat him and return to me
Simplified_Chinese: Here is your next task. Rumors have it, numerous villagers have been attacked by a monstrous Lord Demian just outside of Flaris. Please defeat him and return to me

English: The Lord Demian has been seen wandering nearby the Madren Town recently so search for him there.
Simplified_Chinese: The Lord Demian has been seen wandering nearby the Madren Town recently so search for him there.

English: What? I know I ask much of you, but I never thought you would turn down a chance to prove your worth.
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？我知道我对你要求太多了，但我从没想过你会拒绝证明你的价值的机会。

English: The Lord Demian can be found nearby Madren Town amongst the other Demians.
Simplified_Chinese: The Lord Demian can be found nearby Madren Town amongst the other Demians.

English: Get rid of the Lord Demian and return to Reonan.
Simplified_Chinese: Get rid of the Lord Demian and return to Reonan.

English: Finally, the villagers may rest assured that the Lord Demian shall no longer terrorize them. You have much potential.
Simplified_Chinese: Finally, the villagers may rest assured that the Lord Demian shall no longer terrorize them. You have much potential.

English: Weed Whacked!
Simplified_Chinese: 除草机！

English: I now have another favor to ask of you. A mysterious curse has turned the once docile Fefern into foul beasts which are ravaging the land. Will you defeat them?
Simplified_Chinese: 我现在需要你的帮忙。一个神秘的诅咒将原来温顺的菲菲龙变成了嗜血如命的肮脏怪物。你愿意击杀它们吗？

English: Fefern can be found in the Northwest region of Flaris. Please kill 10 Fefern & 5 2nd Class Fefern and come back.
Simplified_Chinese: 菲菲龙可以在帕里的西北区域找到。请杀死10个菲菲龙和5个大菲菲龙后再来找我。

English: So that’s it? You eliminate a giant Rogue, yet tremble at the sight of some mere weeds?
Simplified_Chinese: 你就这水平？你击败了一个暴徒，却被一堆杂草吓得发抖？

English: If you cross the bridge located in Northern Flaris, you will find the Fefern.
Simplified_Chinese: 当你过了位于帕里北部的桥后，你就会找到菲菲龙的。

English: It's as I've come to expect. The villagers are rejoicing of your heroic deeds. You my friend, have earned yourself quite a reputation around here.
Simplified_Chinese: 正如我所料。居民们正为你的英雄事迹欢呼呢。我的朋友，你为你自己争取到了周围人的敬重。

English: Kill 10 Fefern & 5 2nd Class Fefern and go back to Reonan.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死10个菲菲龙和5个大菲菲龙后再回来找瑞尔南。

English: The Mayor's Aid
Simplified_Chinese: 市长的援助

English: It appears that word of your selfless exploits has reached the Mayor of Flarine. I believe he has something important about which to speak with you. Please speak with him
Simplified_Chinese: 看来你无私奉献的消息传到帕里市长那里了。我相信他有一些重要的事情要和你说。请去找他吧。

English: The Mayor of Flarine can be found in Central Flarine. Please see what it is he requires of you.
Simplified_Chinese: 你可以在帕里镇中心找到帕里市长。请去看看他找你有什么事。

English: Well, not that I can blame you. I have no time to meddle with politicians.
Simplified_Chinese: 行吧，这与我无关，我也没什么好指责你的。我没有时间去多管这些政客的闲事。

English: It is with a warm heart that I welcome you to our humble town young adventurer! The citizens of this town speak highly of all you.
Simplified_Chinese: 年轻的冒险者，我怀着激动的心欢迎你来到我们这个小镇！这里的居民对你的评价很高。

English: You haven't met Mayor of Flarine yet?
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没有去见帕里市长吗？

English: Go speak with the Mayor of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 去和帕里市长谈谈。

English: The Furry Menace
Simplified_Chinese: 彩冠翎猫的威胁

English: I wanted to meet you personally to thank you for all you have done for us. I don't wish to impose, but I hoped you could again call upon your courage.
Simplified_Chinese: 我想亲自见你来感谢你为我们做的所有事情。我不想强迫你，但我仍然希望你能再次使用你的勇气帮助我们。

English: Our town guard was once sizeable enough to fend off most of Shade's masquerpets. Now, with each passing day their numbers and power increases, while ours dwindles.
Simplified_Chinese: 曾经我们镇子的防卫力量足够强大，可以抵御很多谢德莉的怪物。但随着怪物们的数量的增加以及变强，我们的防卫力量开始在慢慢变弱，渐渐无法抵御它们的攻击。

English: With that said, could you please help us to exterminate a particularly vicious group of Nyangnyang roaming the lands?
Simplified_Chinese: 话说到这，请问你可以帮助我们消灭游荡在这片土地的非常邪恶的彩冠翎猫吗？

English: Nyangnyang can be found in Northern Flaris, right after crossing the bridge. Killing 10 Cute Nyangnyang & 5 Nyangnyang should be sufficient to aid us.
Simplified_Chinese: 彩冠翎猫可以在帕里北部，过了桥之后找到。杀死10个彩冠翎猫仔和5个彩冠翎猫就足够帮助我们了。

English: I understand your apprehension, but I do hope you will reconsider your decision.
Simplified_Chinese: 我理解你的担心，但我还是希望你能再考虑下你的决定。

English: Hah! It is as the citizens have said, you ARE truly a great warrior.
Simplified_Chinese: 好！正如居民们所说的，你是一个真正伟大的战士。

English: The Nyangnyang roam the lands right across the bridge of Northern Flaris. Please help us to decrease their numbers!
Simplified_Chinese: 彩冠翎猫游荡在帕里北部的桥对面。请帮助我们消灭它们。

English: Kill 10 Cute Nyangnyang & 5 Nyangnyang and return to the Mayor of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死10只彩冠翎猫仔和5只彩冠翎猫后再回去找帕里市长。

English: Stomping Grounds
Simplified_Chinese: 大地颤抖

English: Given your prior victory, I have another favor to ask. An unwieldy group of bangs have really shaken things up in Northern Flaris. Can we count on you to take care of them?
Simplified_Chinese: 考虑到你之前成功的完成了任务，我还有另一个请求。一群笨重的魔导战甲士兵把帕里北部弄得翻天覆地的。请问你能帮我们去给他们一些教训吗？

English: Bangs can be found in North side of Flaris, near by Nyangnyang. Go kill 10 Bang & 5 Captain Bang and come back.
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导战甲士兵可以在帕里北部，彩冠翎猫栖息地附近找到。去杀死10个魔导战甲士兵和5个魔导战甲队长后再回来。

English: Your prior deeds for us are enough to earn my gratitude.
Simplified_Chinese: 非常感谢你为我们做的所有事情。

English: You've taken care of the issue already!? Astonishing! Now our mining operations in the mountains of Flaris may resume!
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经处理好这些问题了吗！？真令人难以置信！现在我们终于能继续在帕里的山里采矿了！

English: Bangs can be found in Northern Flaris near the Nyangnyangs. Removing at least 10 Bangs and 5 Captain Bangs should resolve any issues.
Simplified_Chinese: 魔导战甲士兵可以在帕里北部，彩冠翎猫附近找到。杀死至少10个魔导战甲士兵和5个魔导战甲队长就可以解决我们的问题。

English: Kill 10 Bang & 5 Captain Bang and return to the Mayor of Flarine.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死10个魔导战甲士兵和5个魔导战甲队长后再回来找帕里市长。

English: A Hero Emerges!
Simplified_Chinese: 英雄崛起！

English: Know that I, as well as the citizens of Flaris, are forever in your debt. If you are ever in need of assistance, do not hesitate to ask!
Simplified_Chinese: 我和帕里的居民们都很清楚，我们永远欠你人情。如果你需要我们的帮助，请不要羞于启齿。

English: Carry on now young adventurer! I can tell you will accomplish great things. Oh, I believe Reonan was looking for you as well. Won't you speak with him?
Simplified_Chinese: 年轻的冒险者继续前进吧！你一定会成就一番事业的。噢，我相信瑞尔南正在找你，你不想和他谈谈吗？

English: Before you leave, please tell Reonan thanks for bringing you to my attention. He, as well, has my gratitude.
Simplified_Chinese: 在你离开前，请告诉瑞尔南，我很感谢他也很感谢他引领你来帮助我们。

English: Well, I don't mind if you stay here. Who knows, perhaps you might even be the Mayor of Flarine one day! Haha!
Simplified_Chinese: 没事，我也并不介意你待在这。谁知道呢，也许某天你就成为了帕里市长了！哈哈！

English: A safe return I see? You no doubt have completed the mayor's request. Oh and his gratitude? Can't say I've ever trusted the word of a politician, but I will take it! Hah!
Simplified_Chinese: 安全地回来了？毫无疑问你完成了市长的委托。噢？还带来了他的感激？虽然我从不信任政客们说的话，但我心领了！哈哈！

English: Reonan is looking for you.
Simplified_Chinese: 瑞尔南在找你。

English: Go meet with Reonan.
Simplified_Chinese: 去与瑞尔南见面。

English: Dispatch to Saint City
Simplified_Chinese: 前往晨光

English: Nonetheless, because of your work, it appears peace has finally been restored to Flarine. Alas, Madrigal is a world ripe with distress.
Simplified_Chinese: 因为你的付出，帕里终于恢复了和平。但是瑞加大陆是一个充满着痛苦的世界。

English: I have received word from a contact in Saint City that masquerpet attacks are steadily on the rise. It also seems that the concerns of the towns people go unheeded.
Simplified_Chinese: 我从晨光的线人处听说晨光受怪物攻击的频率正在增加。似乎没有人帮助晨光的居民。

English: It looks like this could once again be your chance to prove your true worth. Make haste to Saint City and meet my contact Leann!
Simplified_Chinese: 这看起来又是一个能证明你真正价值的机会。请你马上动身前去晨光与我的线人露恩见面吧！

English: You can reach Saint City by flying west from this location using an Airship from Central Flarine or your own Flying device. You may also purchase a blinkwing of Saint Morning from Marche, the resident magician.
Simplified_Chinese: 你可以通过乘坐帕里镇中心的飞船或是自己的飞行器前往这个位置的西边来抵达晨光。你可能需要从魔导士玛尔琪处购买晨光翅膀。

English: Hmm, I guess this worlds call for heroes is currently falling upon deaf ears.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯... 我猜这个世界对英雄的呼唤现在被置若罔闻了。

English: Where is the savior that Reonan was talking about? I don't have time to talk to you. This is not a good time for me to guide you around!! Traveler!!.
Simplified_Chinese: 瑞尔南说的救世主在哪？我没有空和你闲谈。旅行者！！这并不是适合给你指路的时间！！

English: My contact's name is Leann. You can meet her in the Saint Morning square, in front of the Cathedral.
Simplified_Chinese: 我的线人叫露恩。你可以在晨光广场的大教堂前见到她。

English: Meet Leann in front of the Cathedral in Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 在晨光的大教堂前与露恩见面。

English: A Warm Reception?
Simplified_Chinese: 一次热情的接待？

English: Sorry, I'm busy looking for someone so hurry… What did you say? YOU are the hero Reonan spoke of!? I imagined you to look, oh… a tad more heroic?
Simplified_Chinese: 抱歉，我现在非常着急寻找某个人... 你说什么？你就是瑞尔南说的那位英雄吗！？我想象中的你会看起来...比较英勇？

English: Well, where are my manners? Heh. Welcome to Saint City, the biggest town of Madrigal, supplier of airships and… oh sorry, you probably don't care about any of this!
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，是我失礼了。哈。欢迎来到瑞加大陆上最大的城镇晨光镇，这里是飞船的产地并且还是... 噢，抱歉，我想你对这些应该不太感兴趣！

English: Reonan DID send you here for more than listening to me ramble about our town, but hey! I'm a tour guide, it's what I do! Anyway! The mayor requests your presence. Please speak with him.
Simplified_Chinese: 瑞尔南派你来到这里不是为了听我碎碎念关于晨光镇的事情的，不过，嘿！我是一个旅游向导，这就是我的工作！不管怎样！市长想要见你。请你前去与他谈一谈。

English: The Mayor of Saint City is standing behind me. He'll inform you more of the situation at hand!
Simplified_Chinese: 晨光市长就在我后面。他会告诉你更多我们目前所拥有的信息！

English: Don't feel like it? Just don't expect me to babysit you all day long! I'm a busy gal ya know!
Simplified_Chinese: 你不喜欢它吗？那也不要指望我能照顾你一整天！我可是个忙碌的女孩呢！

English: Ah! So you must be the famed hero of Flaris I've heard so much about? I guess I owe you my thanks already for making the trip to Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈！你一定就是帕里那位声名远扬的英雄吧？我很感谢你能来一趟晨光。

English: What? Lost? The Mayor is right behind me. Apparently your vision is as bad as Reonan's choice in heroes.
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？这你都找不到吗？市长就在我身后。显然你的眼睛和瑞尔南选择英雄的眼光一样差劲。

English: Meet Mayor of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 与晨光市长见面。

English: Corrupted Cabbage Patch
Simplified_Chinese: 腐化的紫草食人花

English: Leann and Reonan have informed me of your imminent arrival. Word of your deeds has also spread amongst our citizens. You must be quite an outstanding person for someone your age.
Simplified_Chinese: 露恩和瑞尔南已经告知我我你的到来。你的事迹早已被晨光镇的居民熟知了。你一定是同龄人中的佼佼者。

English: Oh? You want to know about Reonan? He's even sort of a mystery to me. Some say he can slay a Meteonyker with his bare hands. Tall tales aside, I have a request for you…
Simplified_Chinese: 噢？你想了解一下瑞尔南吗？他对于我来说也是非常神秘的一个人。有的人说他可以赤手空拳杀死一条飞龙。就先不说废话了，我需要你的帮助...

English: An army of ravenous plants are emerging and threatening the safety of our citizens. They seem to be the result of some mysterious dark magic.
Simplified_Chinese: 一大群邪恶贪婪的植物正在不断出现并且威胁到了我们居民们的安全。它们似乎是受到某种神秘的黑暗魔法所腐化了。

English: Known as Wagsaac, these plants eat everything standing in their way. Please head south of Saint City and defeat 10 Small Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac.
Simplified_Chinese: 这些植物被称为紫草食人花，它们会吃掉途径的所有的东西。请前往晨光南部，并杀死10个紫草食人花幼苗和5个紫草食人花。

English: Hmm, it appears that the stories of your selfless heroism were a little exaggerated.
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯...看来你无私的英雄事迹被他们夸大了。

English: It appears that the tales of your deeds are true! With the Wagsaac threat contained, our guards can once again focus on the defense of Saint City!
Simplified_Chinese: 看来关于你英雄事迹的传说是真的！当紫草食人花的威胁被解决后，我们的防卫力量就可以重新专注于晨光的防守了。

English: Please defeat 10 Small Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac South of the Town. Our guards are already at working trying to eliminate this menace and could use assistance!
Simplified_Chinese: 请杀死位于城镇南部的10个紫草食人花幼苗和5个紫草食人花。我们的警卫正在那努力消灭这些威胁，他们需要你的援助！

English: Kill 10 Small Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac and return to the Mayor of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死10个紫草食人花幼苗和5个紫草食人花后返回晨光市长处。

English: Pint Sized Hero
Simplified_Chinese: 小英雄

English: It appears as if I must again call upon you for a favor. We have reports of a missing child, but unfortunately our guards are too occupied to help.
Simplified_Chinese: 看来我还需要再请你帮我个忙。我们得到通报说一个孩子走丢了，但是很不幸的是我们的守卫没办法分出人手去帮忙。

English: The boy, named Nerco, apparently left a note to his mother saying he wanted to defeat monsters just like the Hero of Flaris! For his sake, please find and protect him!
Simplified_Chinese: 这个孩子叫尼尔科，他给他的母亲留下了一张纸条，纸条上说他要像帕里的英雄一样去打败怪物！所以，请找到并保护他！

English: His mother believes him to be in Southern Saint Morning, attempting to take on the Mia by himself. Please protect him by defeating 10 Small Mia & 5 Mia.
Simplified_Chinese: 他母亲相信他正在晨光南部尝试独自对付米娅娃娃。请通过击杀10只粗布米娅娃娃和5只花布米娅娃娃来保护他。

English: What? Why am I asking you to find just a KID? Kids are the future of Madrigal. You have a bad mental attitude.
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？为什么我仅仅让你去找一个孩子？孩子们可是瑞加大陆的未来啊，你现在的心理想法很不健康

English: Tremble ghosts, for I am the mightiest warrior in the… wait, who are you? You are interrupting my ghost slaying!
Simplified_Chinese: Tremble ghosts, for I am the mightiest warrior in the… wait, who are you? You are interrupting my ghost slaying!

English: Hurry and find Nerco before the Mia get to him!
Simplified_Chinese: 赶快！务必要在米娅娃娃抓住他之前找到他！

English: Kill 10 Small Mia & 5 Mia and locate Nerco.
Simplified_Chinese: 找到尼尔科并杀死10只粗布米娅娃娃和5只花布米娅娃娃

English: A Mother's Fury
Simplified_Chinese: 愤怒的母亲

English: What? You came here to find me? You must have me confused with someone else. I'm not a lost child, I'm a mighty warrior!!!
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？你是来找我的？你一定是被其他人迷惑了。我不是一个走丢的孩子，我是一个强大的战士！！！

English: Ok, so maybe I did get just a little lost. WHAT!? My mom already reported me missing!? Oh am I in trouble. Mom is gonna take my upgraded wooden sword!!!
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧，我可能确实有点迷路了。什么！？我妈妈已经上报我走丢了吗！？完蛋了，我的超级无敌木剑要被我妈妈没收了！！！

English: Hey... um... YOU!! I need a favor. Please go and tell my mom I'm at a friend's house and will be home for dinner! If not, I am going to throw such a tantrum.
Simplified_Chinese: Hey... um... YOU!! I need a favor. Please go and tell my mom I'm at a friend's house and will be home for dinner! If not, I am going to throw such a tantrum.

English: Hehe, I knew you would accept my request. Please tell my mom everything is fine. Don't worry about me, I will go back soon enough!
Simplified_Chinese: 嘿嘿，我就知道你会接受我的请求。请告诉我妈妈我一切安好，不需要担心我，我会马上回家的！

English: No! No! I won't go! I won't go! I won't go! You can't make me!
Simplified_Chinese: 不！不！我不会离开的！我不走！我不走！你不能强迫我离开！

English: What? At a friend's house? Oh that Nerco is such a little lying !@#!&@ When he comes back, I will kick his ~!#@$!#&#!@#!...
Simplified_Chinese: 什么？在他的一个朋友家里吗？这个尼尔科真是个撒谎精！@#!&@，当他回家后，我一定要踢他的~!#@$!#&#!@#!...

English: Tell Lusina Nerco's words.
Simplified_Chinese: 将尼尔科的话转述给卢西娜。

English: Like finding a Hair band in a Pumpkin Patch
Simplified_Chinese: 遗失在南瓜地的发带

English: Hey you... It's no use talking to my mommy right now. When she gets angry, she gets ANGRY.*giggle* Give her some time!
Simplified_Chinese: Hey you... It's no use talking to my mommy right now. When she gets angry, she gets ANGRY.*giggle* Give her some time!

English: Since you aren't busy now, I know you would looooooove to do me a favor! *giggle* A few days ago I lost my favorite Marble Hair band outside of the town. Please please find it?
Simplified_Chinese: Since you aren't busy now, I know you would looooooove to do me a favor! *giggle* A few days ago I lost my favorite Marble Hair band outside of the town. Please please find it?

English: Yay! Thank you so much! You are super awesome. If I remember right, I lost it playing hide and seek with Nerco near the Pumpkin Village.
Simplified_Chinese: 吖！非常谢谢你！你真是个超级大好人。如果我记得没错的话，我是在南瓜村和尼尔科玩躲猫猫的时候弄丢的。

English: But but but, it was my favoritest… my daddy bought it for me!!!
Simplified_Chinese: 可是...可是...可是它是我最喜欢的东西...是我爸爸买给我的！！！

English: You found my hair band!? Yay! You are the bestest ever!!! You are a real hero!
Simplified_Chinese: 你找到我的发带了吗！？吖！你果然是有史以来最棒的英雄！！！

English: Be careful! Pumpkin Village has lots of scary Mr.Pumpkins. When I saw one, I ran as fast as I could and lost my scrunchie!
Simplified_Chinese: 小心！南瓜村有很多恐怖的南瓜精。每次当我看到一个南瓜精，我都会飞速的逃走，也正是这个原因我才弄丢了我的发带！

English: Find Marble Hair band from Pumpkin village and go back to Nersha.
Simplified_Chinese: 找到有大理石纹彩的发带后回去找尼尔莎。

English: A Mother's Embrace
Simplified_Chinese: 来自母亲的拥抱

English: Oh, also! My mommy is looking for you... Go talk to her. Don't worry, she is cooled down now.
Simplified_Chinese: Oh, also! My mommy is looking for you... Go talk to her. Don't worry, she is cooled down now.

English: I think she wants to thank you for helping me!
Simplified_Chinese: 我想她是想感谢你帮助我！

English: Hmm... If you go back to Mayor, this mission will fail...
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm... If you go back to Mayor, this mission will fail...

English: Good to see you again. Sorry for earlier, it's just that Nerco makes me so angry sometimes. Anyway, I heard you found something for my daughter.
Simplified_Chinese: 很高兴再次见到你。我对我之前的态度感到很抱歉，尼尔科时不时的会让我很生气。不管怎样，我听说你为我的女儿找到了一些东西。

English: Please go talk with my mommy!
Simplified_Chinese: 请前去和我的妈妈谈一谈吧！

English: Speak with Lusina.
Simplified_Chinese: 和卢西娜对话。

English: Nothing Like a Home Cooked Meal
Simplified_Chinese: 独一无二的家庭大餐

English: Thank you! You found my son and also helped my daughter. Now I can momentarily feel relieved. Let me treat you to a home cooked meal! Hold on...
Simplified_Chinese: Thank you! You found my son and also helped my daughter. Now I can momentarily feel relieved. Let me treat you to a home cooked meal! Hold on...

English: Ah!!! All of my kitchen knives got rusty. I just wanted to treat you a good meal to show my appreciation... Now, I can't even feed my children!
Simplified_Chinese: 啊！！！我所有的菜刀都生锈了。我还想通过给你做一份大餐来表示我的感谢呢...现在，我甚至都不能为我的孩子们准备饭菜了！

English: You've helped our family so much already, but can I ask you for a favor also?
Simplified_Chinese: 你已经为我的家庭做了那么多，我能不能再请你帮一个忙？

English: If I had some Sharp Edge pieces, I could make a knife and once again be a fit mother! Would you please gather some for me?
Simplified_Chinese: 如果我有一些利刃碎片，我就可以做一把刀，并且能继续做一位合格的母亲了！你愿意帮我收集它们吗？

English: You are really too kind! You can collect Sharp Edge pieces by killing some Red Mantis… and pulling off their legs. Yes, yes, so it sounds a little vicious. It's ok, you will get over it! Haha!
Simplified_Chinese: 你真的是太善良了！你可以通过杀死一些蟹足螳螂...然后拔掉他们的腿来收集利刃碎片。对的，对的，拔掉他们的腿。这听着是不是太残忍了？没事的，你会克服这种想法的！哈哈！

English: Oh dear! Now my children shall surely starve! Children's services will take them away and I will be all alone…
Simplified_Chinese: 噢，亲爱的！现在我的孩子真的要挨饿了！儿童保护机构会将他们从我身边带走，然后只留下我一个人的...

English: How very kind of you! Hope this task wasn't too much of a burden for you. Rest a little now!
Simplified_Chinese: 你真的太善良了！希望这个任务对你来说不会是太大的负担。请你先休息一下吧！

English: Unfortunately, you won't be able to pull the legs off all the Red Mantis. Some of them are attached too tightly. Just keep killing them and you will eventually succeed!
Simplified_Chinese: 不幸的是，你没办法把所有蟹足螳螂的腿都拔下来。因为有些蟹足螳螂的腿和身体连接得非常的紧。就一直猎杀它们直到你的收集足够多的利刃碎片吧！

English: Bring 3 Sharp Edge to Lusina by killing Red Mantis.
Simplified_Chinese: 通过杀死蟹足螳螂获得3片利刃并带给卢西娜。

English: Soups On!
Simplified_Chinese: 开饭了！

English: Well, I should hurry and get dinner going. Would you please fetch Nerco for me? I'm sure if I saw him right now, I'd kick his little butt from here to Darkon!
Simplified_Chinese: Well, I should hurry and get dinner going. Would you please fetch Nerco for me? I'm sure if I saw him right now, I'd kick his little butt from here to Darkon!

English: Thank you so much! I'm sure that crafty little liar is still where you last saw him!
Simplified_Chinese: 实在太感谢你了！我敢肯定那个狡猾的小骗子还在你上次见到他的地方！

English: Well, looks like someone is going to bed on an empty stomach then!
Simplified_Chinese: 看起来有人得饿着肚子睡觉了！

English: You again? I said I would be home soon enough! Don't tell me my mother sent you!?
Simplified_Chinese: You again? I said I would be home soon enough! Don't tell me my mother sent you!?

English: Please go tell Nerco to come home for dinner!
Simplified_Chinese: 请去叫尼尔科回家吃晚饭！

English: Tell Lusina's words to Nerco.
Simplified_Chinese: 将卢西娜的话转述给尼尔科。

English: The Rusty Shackle
Simplified_Chinese: 生锈的脚镣

English: What? My mother told me to come and eat? Awww but I’m just getting started!
Simplified_Chinese: 什么?我妈妈让我回去吃饭?啊啊啊啊,可是我才刚刚开始!

English: What? She's mad at me? If you show Mia's Shackles to her, I know she will be proud! Please take this to my mother.
Simplified_Chinese: 什么?她对我非常生气?如果我将米娅的脚镣展示给她看,我相信她会为我骄傲的!请将这个带给我妈妈。

English: Awesome! Now I can get back to killing more monsters!
Simplified_Chinese: 太棒了!现在我可以回去继续杀死更多的怪物了!

English: It's ok, I understand that you are just jealous! Mwahaha!
Simplified_Chinese: 没关系的,我知道你只是嫉妒我而已!哇哈哈哈!

English: What's this? Some old shackle? What? Nerco told you that he isn't coming back?
Simplified_Chinese: What's this? Some old shackle? What? Nerco told you that he isn't coming back?

English: Hurry up and take Mia's Shackles to my mother, so she can see how great I am!
Simplified_Chinese: Hurry up and take Mia's Shackles to my mother, so she can see how great I am!

English: Give Mia's Shackles to Lusina.
Simplified_Chinese: 将米娅的脚镣交给卢西娜。

English: No Rest for the Wicked
Simplified_Chinese: 永无宁日

English: Oh that little brat! He is out of his mind! That’s it, when I find him he is getting a spanking more terrifying than Shade's fury!!!
Simplified_Chinese: 这个小家伙！他真的是疯了！当我找到他，我一定会狠狠的教训他，让他知道我比幽影谢莉德还要恐怖！！！

English: Oh, by the way! The Mayor of Saint City is looking for you in hurry. I really should go find my son now. I still owe you a meal sometime so come back and see us!
Simplified_Chinese: 噢，顺便说一句！晨光市长正在焦急的找你。我现在真得去找我的儿子了。我还欠你一顿饭喔，记得偶尔回来看看我们！

English: Go see the Mayor of Saint City. I gotta go now. See you!
Simplified_Chinese: 去见见晨光市长吧。我现在要走了。再见！

English: Well, that’s up to you! Either way, I have to rush off now!
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧,这取决于你自己,不管怎样,我得马上动身了!

English: Oh! There you are! I've been waiting for you!. We are in great need of your abilities!
Simplified_Chinese: 噢！你在这啊！我一直在等你呢！我们现在非常需要你的帮助！

English: Hmm, what to spank him with? OH! You are still here? The mayor is looking for you. Please go see him!
Simplified_Chinese: Hmm, what to spank him with? OH! You are still here? The mayor is looking for you. Please go see him!

English: Meet the Mayor of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 与晨光市长见面。

English: Power in Numbers
Simplified_Chinese: 团结的力量

English: Do you know about the Bucrow? They are protectors of the natural order that have existed long before man. They have since grown malicious, and attack our citizens.
Simplified_Chinese: 你知道巴科洛吗？他们是人类出现之前就存在的自然秩序守护者。但是现在他们变得敌视人类，还会攻击我们的居民。

English: I believe the sudden increase in the amount of monsters is to blame. Bucrow are very in tune with the balance of nature, and have become enraged with its disintegration
Simplified_Chinese: 我相信这是因为怪物的数量激增导致的问题。巴科洛对大自然的平衡非常敏感，如果大自然的平衡被打破就会让他们异常愤怒。

English: I must warn you though. Bucrow are very strong, which is why I've asked you to unite with other champions in this task. Please, will you help us to defeat them?
Simplified_Chinese: 但我必须要警告你。巴科洛非常强大。这就是为什么我要求你和其他的英雄合作执行该任务。请问你是否愿意帮我们击败他们？

English: You and your band of allies must travel to Saint Morning's southernmost region known as the Fantasy Desert. This is where the Bucrow primarily reside.
Simplified_Chinese: 你和你的队友必须前往晨光最南部被称为梦幻沙漠的地区。那里是巴科洛主要的栖息地。

English: I might not know with any certainty how the Bucrow first began to become so vicious, but what I do know is that we must do something about them soon!
Simplified_Chinese: 我并不知道巴科洛是如何变得如此狂暴的，但我唯一清楚的就是我们必须马上对他们采取一些必要措施！

English: Done already!? My thanks go out to you and your allies. Sometimes companionship is the key to victory! As soon as you reach level 30, please return to me as I have another request.
Simplified_Chinese: 已经完成了吗！？非常感谢你和你的队友。有时候友谊才是胜利的关键！一旦你到了30级时，请回来找我，我有新的任务要交给你。

English: Please you must all hurry! We cannot sit idly by in such a dire situation.
Simplified_Chinese: 你必须要赶快完成！这种可怕的情况下，我们绝不能袖手旁观。

English: Kill 8 Small Bucrow & 4 Bucrow while in a party and return to the Mayor of Saint City.
Simplified_Chinese: 请在组队的情况下杀死8个小巴科洛和4个巴科洛，然后回去找晨光市长。

English: Hero of Saint City
Simplified_Chinese: 晨光的英雄

English: Hah, you have become quite the celebrity around here! Yes, there is still evil afoot in Saint Morning, but nothing that we can't now contain thanks to your aid!
Simplified_Chinese: 哈，你在晨光已经非常受人敬重了！是的，晨光虽仍有邪恶在酝酿，但有了你的帮助，我们是所向披靡的！

English: I do wish to ask you one last favor. Will you hear me out in my final request?
Simplified_Chinese: 我想最后请你帮个忙。你愿意听听我最后的请求吗？

English: You have my thanks. Word has it, a group of dangerous escaped convicts from Saint City Prison are planning their revenge. Please defeat the Hobo and take his sword as proof!
Simplified_Chinese: 非常感谢。我听说，一群危险的罪犯从晨光监狱逃了出去，并且正在筹划着他们的复仇计划。请击杀独臂浪人并将他们的剑作为证物带回！

English: Hmm…just unfortunate considering how far you have come!
Simplified_Chinese: 好吧...但你已经帮我们做了那么多事，放弃这最后一个请求的话真让人感到很遗憾啊！

English: I knew it all along. Reonan was right. There is truly greatness within you. I, and the people of Saint City, wish to bestow you with this gift of elemental cards. Use them wisely!
Simplified_Chinese: 我就知道瑞尔南是对的。你真的是个伟大的人。我和晨光的人民们希望将这些元素卡作为你的谢礼。合理的使用它们吧！

English: The Hobo should be in the Western Fantasy Desert. Please eliminate this threat!
Simplified_Chinese: 独臂浪人在梦幻沙漠的西部。请消除他们的威胁！

English: Kill Hobo and get the Hobo Sword.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死独臂浪人并拿到他们的剑。

English: Huh? You want me to show you the most powerful skill of mine? Hmm... If you want to see it, I can show you. Here! Put those pieces into my mouth. ah~~
Simplified_Chinese: Huh? You want me to show you the most powerful skill of mine? Hmm... If you want to see it, I can show you. Here! Put those pieces into my mouth. ah~~

English: Mysterious Bounty Hunter
Simplified_Chinese: 神秘的赏金猎人

English: Level 40 eh? You've really grown since our last meeting! Hmm, have you heard of a man named "Ghost" Hael? He is one of Madrigal's best known bounty hunters.
Simplified_Chinese: 40级了吗？在我们没有见面的这段时间，你真的成长了不少啊！嗯，你有没有听过一个叫"幽灵"海尔的男人？他是瑞加大陆最知名的赏金猎人之一。

English: His cold and mysterious demeanor have earned him the title "Ghost". I've heard from sources that he might be traveling through Flaris today.
Simplified_Chinese: 他冷酷和神秘的气质让他获得了"幽灵"的称号。我从消息源处获知他今天将游历帕里。

English: Would you perhaps seek him out for me? If you tell him my name, perhaps it will jog his memory…
Simplified_Chinese: 你愿意替我把他找出来吗？如果你告诉他我们名字，有可能会唤醒他的记忆...

English: Appreciate it! He will be appearing at Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern part of Flaris. Please find him.
Simplified_Chinese: 非常感谢！他将会在帕里北部的亡者之泉出现。请去那找他。

English: What are you scared? I mean, he's not REALLY a ghost.
Simplified_Chinese: 你在怕什么？我的意思是，他并不是真的幽灵。

English: Sure is awfully hard to concentrate with you standing right there. What do you want?
Simplified_Chinese: Sure is awfully hard to concentrate with you standing right there. What do you want?

English: You haven't met Hael yet? He should be at the Fountain of Dead Person.
Simplified_Chinese: 你还没见到海尔吗？他应该在亡者之泉的。

English: Meet Hael and mention Reonan's name.
Simplified_Chinese: 与海尔见面并提及瑞尔南。

English: Time is Money
Simplified_Chinese: 一寸光阴一寸金

English: Wha? Someone named Reonan is looking for me? Sounds familiar but… UGH! I've got way too bad of a headache to be thinking about things right now.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈？一个叫瑞尔南的人正在找我？这个名字听着很熟悉...啊！我现在一想这些事情我就头疼。

English: Reonan... It's the first time hearing that name, but it is familiar... He said its time? Time for what, I wonder…
Simplified_Chinese: 瑞尔南...我第一次听到这个名字，但又如此熟悉...他说是时候了吗？我想知道，是时候是指什么？

English: Regardless! I have my own goals and limited time so move along! There is a foul demon lurking in the Mars Mine with a bounty on its head JUST waiting to be claimed *sneer*
Simplified_Chinese: 无所谓！我有自己的目标并且我的时间很有限，所以请你走开。一个正潜伏在魔域密殿的被悬赏了的邪恶的怪物正等着被我狩猎呢*嘲笑*。

English: UGH! Headache…getting…worse! OK look, here's the deal. You take out that Vice Veduque, give me the reward and I will meet your Reonan. Deal?
Simplified_Chinese: 啊！头疼愈发严重了！好吧，看来只能这样了，我们来做个交易吧。你杀死蛇妖女，然后把奖励给我，我就和你去见瑞尔南。

English: Well, never expected you to accept THAT offer? Well anyway, go kill 10 Vice Veduque in Mars Mine then return to me!
Simplified_Chinese: 真没想到你会接受这个条件。不管怎样，去魔域密殿杀死10个蛇妖女后回来见我！

English: No skin off my back! Planned to do it myself anyway. Just gotta, ya know, rest a minute or two…or three…
Simplified_Chinese: 这对我没什么影响！我自己会计划好然后完成任务。只是，你知道的，我需要休息1分钟或者2分钟...或者3分钟吧...

English: Hmpf killed them huh? Well aren't we proud of ourselves. Anyway, while you were in Mars Mine, I thought again about this here… Reonan, or whatever his name is.
Simplified_Chinese: 已经杀死他们了？我们不应该为自己感到骄傲吗。不管怎样，当你在魔域密殿时，我在这又想了想...瑞尔南，或者不管他叫什么名字。

English: *snores* huh!? What!? I was awake, just resting my eyes!
Simplified_Chinese: *打鼾*哈？什么！？我还清醒着呢，我只是让我的眼睛休息了一下！

English: Kill 10 Vice Veduque and meet Hael.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死10个蛇妖女后与海尔见面。

English: Seeing Through to the Past
Simplified_Chinese: 回忆过往

English: Still not ringing any bells. Though, the name is familiar… Maybe Master Radeon can tell you something about the name. He took me in over 20 years ago and has been my mentor since.
Simplified_Chinese: 还是没能回忆起任何东西。虽然，这个名字很熟悉..可能大师拉迪温可以告诉你关于这个名字的一些事情。他在20多年前接待了我并自那以后就一直是我的导师。

English: I can hardly remember what I had for breakfast. Go talk with Master Radeon alright? I'm sure he might know something…
Simplified_Chinese: 我几乎都想不起来我早餐吃了什么了。去和大师拉迪温谈一谈行吗？我相信他应该知道些什么...

English: Wow, seems like my headache is already lifting knowing I got you out of my hair. Master Radeon is on the other side of the Fountain of the Dead. Go see him!
Simplified_Chinese: 哇，当我不再想你的事情之后，我的头就没那么疼了。大师拉迪温就在亡者之泉的另一边。去见他吧！

English: You don’t want to do it? Alright...
Simplified_Chinese: You don’t want to do it? Alright...

English: Hmm? So Reonan is inquiring of Hael? It appears that it is time…
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯?所以瑞尔南正在调查海尔吗？看来是时候了...

English: Find Master Radeon and ask about the Hael's past.
Simplified_Chinese: 找到大师拉迪温并询问海尔的过去。

English: Shards of Memory
Simplified_Chinese: 记忆碎片

English: I have known Hael many years. When I first discovered him, he was laying there unconscious. I was able to nurse him back to health, but still he had no recollection of his memory. There is a way to recover it though…
Simplified_Chinese: 我已经认识海尔很多年了。当我第一次找到他，他躺在地上不省人事，我可以照顾他使他恢复健康，但他却丢失了记忆。不过有一种方法可以让他恢复记忆...

English: I feel there might be something important lost in his past. The only way to recover it would be by using a Memory Shard. This should allow Hael to uncover his past.
Simplified_Chinese: 我推测他过去可能丢失了什么非常重要的东西。唯一恢复他记忆的办法就是使用记忆碎片。这将会揭开海尔的过去。

English: First, you will need to purify the shard by bringing it to the Magic Box Ancimys. Will you retrieve the purified Memory shard and bring it to Hael?
Simplified_Chinese: 首先，你需要将碎片带去[魔盒] 安瑟麦斯处进行净化。你愿意取回纯净的记忆碎片并带给海尔吗？

English: Please locate the Memory Shard which should be somewhere around the Altar of Violet in Northern Flaris. There are Violet Magician Troupe patrolling the area.
Simplified_Chinese: 记忆碎片可能在帕里北部的紫色的祭团处。那里游荡着紫色魔法剧团长。

English: If you wish Hael's assistance, this might be the only chance you have…
Simplified_Chinese: 如果你想获得海尔的帮助，这可能是你唯一的机会了...

English: Hey! You act like you haven't seen a man trapped in a treasure chest before. Oh you come bearing Memory Shards to be purified?
Simplified_Chinese: 嘿！你没见过被困在宝箱里的人吗？噢，你带着记忆碎片来净化了吗？

English: Please acquire the Memory Shard located at the Altar of Violet, and bring it to Ancimys for purification.
Simplified_Chinese: 请去取得位于紫色的祭团的记忆碎片，然后带去给安瑟麦斯进行净化。

English: Locate the Memory shard in Northern Flaris and bring it to Ancimys
Simplified_Chinese: 在帕里北部找到记忆碎片并带给安瑟麦斯

English: A Chest full of Memories
Simplified_Chinese: 充满回忆的箱子

English: I will purify the Memory Shards sure, but first a joke!
Simplified_Chinese: 当然，我会净化记忆碎片。但你首先得听我说一个笑话！

English: Haha, well since you were so kind to listen here is your crystal. Now go ahead and take it!
Simplified_Chinese: 哈哈，既然你这么善良的愿意听我讲笑话，那就给你记忆碎片吧！上前来拿着它吧。

English: Thanks again for listening. The Pukepukes around here don't have a very good sense of humor! Haha!
Simplified_Chinese: 再次感谢你的倾听。这附近的邪精灵随从一点幽默感都没有，真是无聊！哈哈！

English: What's the deal with this weird looking stone? Oh, for helping me to recall my lost thoughts you say? Oh well, worth a shot!
Simplified_Chinese: 这个看起来奇奇怪怪的石头有什么用吗？你说这是用来帮助我恢复记忆的？噢，好吧，值得一试！

English: Oh back so soon? Don't worry I have plenty more jokes! So what do you get when you cross an Aibatt with... Er wait, I forgot how it goes...
Simplified_Chinese: Oh back so soon? Don't worry I have plenty more jokes! So what do you get when you cross an Aibatt with... Er wait, I forgot how it goes...

English: Bring the purified Memory Shard to Hael.
Simplified_Chinese: 将净化后的记忆碎片带给海尔。

English: The First Pendant
Simplified_Chinese: 第一条项链

English: Woahhhh now, everything is finally clear. Hah...Hah... I finally remember... I can't believe this... I recall Reonan now...
Simplified_Chinese: Woahhhh now, everything is finally clear. Hah...Hah... I finally remember... I can't believe this... I recall Reonan now...

English: We were once good friends who stood together against a great threat… only at that time… we went by different names… I'm sure you will understand in time.
Simplified_Chinese: 我们曾是一起对抗邪恶威胁的非常要好的朋友..只是那段时间...我们使用了不同的名字...我相信你会马上理解的。

English: Here, take this to Reonan. It's a pendant once shared amongst several old comrades… He'll understand when he sees it…
Simplified_Chinese: 给你，把这个交给瑞尔南。这是曾经的战友都佩戴过的一条项链...当他看见这个的时候他会明白的...

English: As for now, I have business to attend to. I will catch up with you guys later. Try not to miss me too much and stuff *sneer*
Simplified_Chinese: 至于现在，我还有事情需要处理。我之后会赶上你们的。尽量不要太想我了 *嘲笑声*

English: Well, I'm in no real hurry. Just take the pendant to Reonan whenever you have the chance.
Simplified_Chinese: 我现在也不着急。当你有时间的时候就把项链带给瑞尔南就行了。

English: This pendant… It was a symbol of the trust that I once shared with Hael. I've been hoping to find him for awhile now to no avail…
Simplified_Chinese: 这条项链...这是我曾和海尔分享的信任的象征。我一直希望能找到他，但却找不到…

English: Take the pendant to Reonan soon. I didn't give it to you as a keepsake.
Simplified_Chinese: 尽快将这条项链带给瑞尔南。我并不是把这个给你当作纪念品的。

English: Bring the pendant from Hael to Reonan.
Simplified_Chinese: 将从海尔处获得的项链带给瑞尔南。

English: Quest for Truth
Simplified_Chinese: 追寻真相

English: Lost memory you say? Must have been hard for him wandering around so aimlessly with no true identity. We will give him time to gather his thoughts…
Simplified_Chinese: 你提到了失忆？对他来说，记不起自己是谁，只能漫无目地四处游荡，肯定很难。我们还是给他留一点时间让他整理一下他的记忆吧...

English: In the meantime, are you aware of the Garden of Rhisis? It is the landmass Northeast of Saint Morning. My friend Handel is currently conducting research there.
Simplified_Chinese: 与此同时，你注意到了莱斯庭院吗？他是晨光东北部的陆地。我的朋友汉德尔正在那里做研究。

English: Her work takes much time and the constant threat of masquerpet attacks doesn't help the process. Will you please go and assist her?
Simplified_Chinese: 她的工作花了很多时间，同时因为怪物们的持续威胁攻击让这个过程越发困难。你愿意前去帮助她吗？

English: You can reach the Garden of Rhisis by flying Northeast from the continent of Saint Morning. Please go there and meet up with Handel
Simplified_Chinese: 你可以从晨光东北部飞到莱斯庭院。请去那里与汉德尔见面。

English: Hah, I see! After using all those town blinkwings, you've already forgotten how to fly.
Simplified_Chinese: 哈，我明白了！在使用了所有这些城市的翅膀之后，你已经忘记了如何飞行。

English: Welcome to the Garden of Rhisis. I have been expecting you. Do you understand the nature of my research?
Simplified_Chinese: 欢迎来到莱斯庭院。我一直在期待你的到来。你了解我研究的内容吗？

English: Handel is in the Northern part of the Garden of Rhisis. Please go locate her!
Simplified_Chinese: 汉德尔在莱斯庭院的北部，请去找她。

English: Go find Handel in the Garden of Rhisis.
Simplified_Chinese: 在莱斯庭院找到汉德尔。

English: Slaves to Shade
Simplified_Chinese: 谢莉德的奴隶

English: You know where these monsters come from right? According to the records, they were the creation of Shade. Angered by her inability to destroy all of Roika, she plagued the lands with these foul beasts.
Simplified_Chinese: 你知道这些怪物是从哪里来的对吗？根据记录，他们是谢莉德的产物。谢莉德因无法摧毁罗伊卡而愤怒，她用这些肮脏的野兽折磨着这片大陆。

English: Shade and her monsters succeeded in taking over all of Madrigal. She was subsequently defeated by 8 brave heroes who all rose to the challenge, restoring peace to the land.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢莉德和她的怪物们成功的掌控了瑞加大陆。但随后她被八位勇敢的英雄奋起反抗打败了，这些英雄将和平再次带给了大陆。

English: Shade is now dead, but monsters that she created still exist. In fact, they seem to be growing stronger and greater in number. I'm here in the hopes of uncovering some sort of answer.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢莉德已经死亡了，但是她创造的怪兽仍然存在。实际上，他们数量正在增加并且力量正在变强。我来到这就是问了寻求这个情况的答案。

English: Research is difficult with the constant threat of Tombstone Bearers around. Will you please help buy me some time by defeating them?
Simplified_Chinese: 由于碑石工匠在周围不断地威胁安全，研究很难正常开展。你愿意花点时间帮我打败他们吗？

English: Thank you for your assistance. Killing 15 Tombstone Bearers should allow me ample time to complete my research.
Simplified_Chinese: 谢谢你的协助。杀死15个碑石工匠应该就可以让我有足够时间完成我的研究了。

English: For the sake of truth, please do not pass up my request!
Simplified_Chinese: 为了追求真相，请不要拒绝我的请求！

English: I've done it!! Because of your bravery, I've found an important piece of information.
Simplified_Chinese: 我已经完成了！！因为你的勇敢，我已经找到了一条非常重要的信息。

English: I'm still in the process of research. Please go and defeat 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers while I complete my work!
Simplified_Chinese: 我仍在继续做研究。请在我完成我工作的同时，前去杀死15个碑石工匠学徒和7个碑石工匠。

English: Defeat 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死15个碑石工匠学徒和7个碑石工匠。

English: Endless Loop
Simplified_Chinese: 无尽的循环

English: While conducting my research, I found something of interest about the pillars carried by the Tombstone Bearers. It looks similar to those of Shade's temple.
Simplified_Chinese: 在进行研究时，我发现在碑石工匠携带的石碑上有一些很有趣的东西。它看起来和谢莉德的神殿很像。

English: Upon looking further into the information, I found that Tombstone Bearers were actually slaves of Shade that built her temple. But why would they be here in the Garden of Rhisis?
Simplified_Chinese: Upon looking further into the information, I found that Tombstone Bearers were actually slaves of Shade that built her temple. But why would they be here in the Garden of Rhisis?

English: I need to acquire more data! Would you help me further by acquiring an Ancient Inscription? This might provide the insight I'm looking for!
Simplified_Chinese: 我需要获得更多的数据！你愿意进一步帮助我获得一个古代铭文吗？这可能会让我获得一直寻找的灵感！

English: I knew you would have accepted. You too yearn to discover the truth! You can find a Ancient Inscription by defeating any of the Tombstone Bearers
Simplified_Chinese: 我知道你会接受的。你太渴望发现真相了！你可以通过杀死任何一个碑石工匠拿到古代铭文。

English: How could you decline? This could potentially reveal so much to us about Shade's masquerpets and their growing strength!
Simplified_Chinese: How could you decline? This could potentially reveal so much to us about Shade's masquerpets and their growing strength!

English: You got it!! Please hand it over quickly for me to analyze!
Simplified_Chinese: 没错！！请尽快将它交给我分析！

English: Even if you don't initially receive an Ancient Inscription, keep defeating them! I'm sure one of these Tombstone Bearers is bound to have the Ancient Inscription!
Simplified_Chinese: 如果你第一次没能拿到古代铭文，那就继续击杀他们！我相信这些碑石工匠中肯定有一个会掉落古代铭文的！

English: Acquire an Ancient Inscription from one of the Tombstone Bearers.
Simplified_Chinese: 从碑石工匠中获取古代铭文。

English: Essence of the Gods
Simplified_Chinese: 神的意识

English: It's of no use… The stamp is just too damaged to gather much significant information. It did allude to the War of the Gods though…
Simplified_Chinese: 这没用...这个印记被破坏得太严重了，我没法从中收集足够多的重要信息。但它确实暗指了神的战争...

English: I know from lore that, during this time, Bubble decided to take action against Shade and her masquerpet army. A battle occurred between the gods at this very location.
Simplified_Chinese: 我从传说中了解到，在那段时期，波布尔决定采取行动对抗谢莉德和她的怪物军团。就在这个地方，众神之间发生了一场战斗。

English: It is rumored that the essence of both gods remains in this garden till this day. Could you please find the Bubble Trace for me?
Simplified_Chinese: 据传，这两位神的意识至今仍留在这座花园里。请问你可以为我寻找到波布尔的踪迹吗？

English: Please defeat the Basques in the North and acquire the Bubble Trace. Once you have this, take it to Bowler. He knows much more ancient lore than myself.
Simplified_Chinese: 请击杀北部的巴斯克斗士并获取波布尔的踪迹。当你拿到后，请将它带给保罗克。他比我知道更多古代传说。

English: You don't want to help me? Oh well... Then I will go myself...
Simplified_Chinese: You don't want to help me? Oh well... Then I will go myself...

English: Hmm? Yes I am Bowler, last keeper of the lore of this continent. WHAT!? You come bearing the Bubble Trace!?
Simplified_Chinese: 嗯?是的，我就是保罗克，这个大陆上最后的传说的守护者。什么！？你带着波布尔的踪迹来的！？

English: Please kill 15 Basques, acquire the Bubble Trace and take it to Bowler.
Simplified_Chinese: 请杀死15个巴斯克斗士，在拿到波布尔的踪迹后将它带给保罗克。

English: Kill 15 Phantom Basques & 7 Basques and find the Bubble Trace and bring it to Bowler.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死15个轻量级巴斯克斗士和7个巴斯克斗士，并找到波布尔的踪迹后交给保罗克。

English: Essence of the Gods (2)
Simplified_Chinese: 神的意识（2）

English: According to my ancestors, this region was once a primary location for a massive conflict between Bubble and Shade. Lets put it this way, Madrigal was once all one continent before this war…
Simplified_Chinese: 据我的先祖们说，这个区域曾是波布尔和谢莉德之间的巨大冲突的主要发生地。这么说吧，瑞加大陆是在这场战争之前还是完整的一块大陆...

English: We must also acquire the Shade trace. It's rumored to be held by the Pranksters, the last remnants of the followers of Shade. As you can see, I'm a tad too short to confront them. Could you get it for me?
Simplified_Chinese: We must also acquire the Shade trace. It's rumored to be held by the Pranksters, the last remnants of the followers of Shade. As you can see, I'm a tad too short to confront them. Could you get it for me?

English: I appreciate the assistance. Please go Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters and acquire the Shade trace.
Simplified_Chinese: 感谢你的协助。请去击杀15个见习小丑术士和7个小丑术士，并获得谢莉德的踪迹。

English: What? Expect a poor little Dwarpet such as myself to take on an army of Pranksters?
Simplified_Chinese: What? Expect a poor little Dwarpet such as myself to take on an army of Pranksters?

English: So according to Bowler, this was the site of the battle between Bubble and Shade? The essence of each that you contain is definitive proof of this.
Simplified_Chinese: 按照保罗克所说的，这个地方就是波布尔和谢莉德发生战争的地方？你所拥有的每一份意识就是这一点的确凿证据。

English: Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, find the Shade Trace and bring it to Handel.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死15个见习小丑术士和7个小丑术士，找到谢莉德的踪迹并将它带给汉德尔。

English: Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, acquire the Shade Trace and bring it to Handel.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死15个见习小丑术士和7个小丑术士，获取谢莉德的踪迹并将其带给汉德尔。

English: Guardians of the Temple
Simplified_Chinese: 圣殿守护者

English: This essence of Shade is concerning… After the 8 Heroes had defeated Shade, all remnants of her existence were to be purged to prevent her return.
Simplified_Chinese: 在八大英雄击败谢莉德后，谢莉德意识的存在仍让人担忧....为了防止她的回归，她存在的所有残余都需要被清除。

English: If her essence remains, this is very bad… Stored in the Temple of Iblis is the Parchment of War. Please head there and retrieve it for me.
Simplified_Chinese: If her essence remains, this is very bad… Stored in the Temple of Iblis is the Parchment of War. Please head there and retrieve it for me.

English: The Temple of Iblis is in the Southern most region of Saint Morning. The records are guarded by both Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian so please defeat them to obtain it!
Simplified_Chinese: 依普利神殿就在晨光的最南部的地区。记录中所描述的伊普里斯神庙由秘殿破坏者和秘殿警戒者共同守卫，所以请击败他们拿到羊皮纸！

English: We've come too far to just quit now! Please reconsider!!
Simplified_Chinese: 我们已经做了那么多，不能现在退出！请重新考虑！！

English: You've made it back with the Parchment!
Simplified_Chinese: 你带着战争卷轴回来了！

English: Please bring the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.
Simplified_Chinese: Please bring the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.

English: Bring Handel the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.
Simplified_Chinese: Bring Handel the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.

English: Before He's Road kill…
Simplified_Chinese: 在他被杀之前…

English: Please you must quickly hurry to Bowler! It seems the Wheelems near him have grown increasingly aggressive and he has grown quite fearful!
Simplified_Chinese: 你必须赶紧去保罗克那！他身边的独轮蒸汽机似乎变得越来越有攻击性，他现在非常害怕！

English: Will you hurry to his aid? In the meanwhile, I will attempt to decrypt these records. I know they contain something worthwhile!!
Simplified_Chinese: Will you hurry to his aid? In the meanwhile, I will attempt to decrypt these records. I know they contain something worthwhile!!

English: Your assistance is truly appreciated! Hurry and defeat 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems then report to Bowler!
Simplified_Chinese: 非常感谢你的帮助！请尽快杀死20个轻型独轮蒸汽机和10个中型独轮蒸汽机后向保罗克报告！

English: Oh no!! You must help him! Bowler doesn't stand a chance against those vicious Wheelems!
Simplified_Chinese: 哦，不！！你必须帮助他！保罗克根本没有能力对抗那些恶毒的独轮蒸汽机！

English: That was too close of a call! The Wheelems generally left me alone. For whatever reason, they suddenly grew violent and attempted to attack me while I was out near their territory.
Simplified_Chinese: 你来得太及时了！独轮蒸汽机怪物们一般都会让我一个人呆着。不知出于什么原因，当我在他们的地盘附近时，他们突然变得暴力起来，并试图攻击我。

English: Hurry! Kill 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems before they can reach Bowler!
Simplified_Chinese: 快！在独轮蒸汽机怪物们到达保罗克那之前，杀死20个轻型独轮蒸汽机和10个中型独轮蒸汽机！

English: Kill 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems and report to Bowler.
Simplified_Chinese: 杀死20个轻型独轮蒸汽机和10个中型独轮蒸汽机后向保罗克汇报。

English: The Moment of Truth
Simplified_Chinese: 真相时刻

English: The number of Wheelems has increased so much since I last remember. If it weren't for you, I would have been Dwarpet road kill…
Simplified_Chinese: 独轮蒸汽机的数量比上次增长了很多。如果不是你，我估计已经被杀死了...

English: Has Handel finished her research? Oh! She is currently decrypting the Parchment of War? Will you hurry back to her and find if she has finished?
